casebody.data:
IN RE: A.R.A., P.Z.A., Z.K.A. 65A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2019 Sydney J. Batch, Attorney at Law, for Akers, Aaron. Charles E. Wilson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Cleveland County Department of Social Services. William L. Esser, IV, Attorney at Law, for State. Christopher M. Watford, Attorney at Law, for Akers, Terri Lynn.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Briefs filed on the 17th of May 2019 by Respondent-Parents:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2019."
